map
Class Map

java.lang.Object
  map.Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class' sole purpose is to save the information relating to the simulation.

See Also:

Field Detail

countries

private volatile Countries countries
The object that contains all of the countries in the map.

globalLog

private volatile java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> globalLog
The simulation's global log.

paused

private volatile boolean paused
This variable is used to indicate if the simulation is paused or not. The default value is true (the simulation is paused).

serialVersionUID

private static final long serialVersionUID
See Also:
Constant Field Values

simulationFinished

private volatile boolean simulationFinished
This variable is true if the simulation has ended (i.e. one country owns all the states.) and false otherwise.

turn

private volatile Country turn
The country whose turn it is. The volatile modifier is used to make sure that all parties see the changes made to country immediately after it is changed. When the program starts the first time, the countries aren't known, and therefore null implies that when the simulation is first initiated, the first country in the list of countries should be used to run the simulation.

Constructor Detail

Map

public Map()
Null constructor. All variables need to be set by the user.

public boolean isPaused()
Returns true if the simulation is paused.

Returns:

isSimulationFinished

public boolean isSimulationFinished()
Returns true if the simulation has finished (i.e. one country owns all of the states) and false otherwise.

Returns:
Returns true if the simulation has finished.

setPaused

public void setPaused(boolean paused)
Allows users to pause the simulation.

Parameters:
paused - True if the simulation should be paused.

setSimulationFinished

public void setSimulationFinished(boolean finished)
This method allows the user to declare that the simulation has ended.

Parameters:
finished - True if the simulation has ended, and false otherwise.

setTurn

public void setTurn(Country country)
Sets the country whose turn it is.

Parameters:
country - The country whose turn it is.

togglePaused

public void togglePaused()
Allows the user to atomically change the paused variable. If the simulation is paused, then the method unpauses the simulation. If the simulation isn't paused, then the method pauses the simulation.
